1486490.name: RPG Maker MZ - Krachware User Interface Material FANTASY
1486490.description:
Everyone loves spending time in a perfectly generated fantasy world. Now you can create your own by using this new set of vintage-inspired user interface assets from Gee Kun Soft! This fantasy pack comes with hundreds of options for any RPG creator’s historic vision, including button art and borders for title screens or narrative, along with now loading and game over screens and other bonus material. Pick up this pack and start building your steampunk world today in RPG Maker!

Features:

* titles2 folder: 72 frames (13 designs) for openings and more!
* system folder: 160 windowskins (10 designs x 16 patterns), "Game Over" x 9, "Loading" x 4
* bonus folder: 192 buttons, other 167 materials such as arrow icons and decorative graphics!

**Please note that you need the editing software to work with some of the material in "bonus" folder for RPG Makers**

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1486490.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
